alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued May 01 at 4:32AM EDT until May 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: * WHAT...Minor splash-over and coastal erosion in low-lying coastal areas. * WHERE...Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...Around the high tide occurring around 8:30 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Building waves will cause minor splash-over and possible erosion on exposed coastal roads and shorelines. Pedestrians and motorists should use caution along shorelines. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Bar Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 15.5 ft, Moderate 17.0 ft, Major 18.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 4.1 ft, Moderate 5.6 ft, Major 6.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/08 AM 11.9 0.5 2.1 7-8 None 01/09 PM 11.0 -0.4 1.0 2-3 None 02/09 AM 10.8 -0.6 0.7 2 None 02/10 PM 11.5 0.1 1.0 2 None 03/10 AM 11.2 -0.2 0.9 2 None 03/10 PM 12.0 0.6 1.0 2 None Deer Isle Causeway MLLW Categories - info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
